Hotel.Name: Marriott Hotel
Hotel.Description:
Featuring free bikes, a fitness centre as well as a bar, Warsaw Marriott Hotel is located in the centre of Warsaw, 400 metres from Warsaw Central Railway Station. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides nightclub and an ATM.
All units at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bath, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Every room comes with a kettle, while some rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette with a fridge, a dishwasher and a stovetop. At Warsaw Marriott Hotel the rooms have bed linen and towels.
A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available daily at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Mediterranean and Polish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.
There is an on-site snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area.

Popular points of interest near Warsaw Marriott Hotel include Złote Tarasy Shopping Centre, Palace of Culture and Science and Centrum Subway Station. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

Hotel.Name: Hotel Scout
Hotel.Description:
All air-conditioned rooms at the Scout are classically furnished and decorated with warm colours. Each comes with work space, a seating area and private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.
The hotel features the Squash Club with 6 squash courts, a climbing wall, tennis courts and a free sauna and gym. An automated bowling alley is also available and it comes with a pub. A roller skating area is also on-site.
A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the hotel’s modern restaurant. The buffet includes cold as well as hot appetizers and meals.
After a long day, guests can relax in the sauna. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can assist with luggage storage.

Hotel.Name: Apartamenty Warszawa Kasprzaka 29
Hotel.Description:
Situated within 2.2 km of Blue City and 2.3 km of Warsaw Uprising Museum, Apartamenty Warszawa Kasprzaka 29 features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Warsaw. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.
The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.
There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available. During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.
Warsaw West Train Station is 1.9 km from Apartamenty Warszawa Kasprzaka 29, while Warsaw Central Railway Station is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 6 km from the accommodation.
